Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
Check the out screenshots above for a short demo about how to access the element formatter. 

Each formatter may provide additional Settings. Settings allow you to tweak to generated output. It's important to understand that formatter and settings are stored in the Page, not the Content itself. So you can use the same content on different pages or even on the same page with different formatters and settings. 

Go ahead and try to change the formatter and settings for some elements on this pageto get familiar with the concept.

Link.Text: Continue with step 4: Working with the Sitemap
